Issue.creator: yacovm
Issue.description: WARN 013 Before using BCCSP, please call InitFactories(). Falling back to bootBCCSP. 2017-05-17 04:22:15.959 EDT bccsp GetDefault -> WARN 014 Before using BCCSP, please call InitFactories(). Falling back to bootBCCSP. 2017-05-17 04:22:15.961 EDT bccsp GetDefault -> WARN 015 Before using BCCSP, please call InitFactories(). Falling back to bootBCCSP. 2017-05-17 04:22:15.962 EDT bccsp GetDefault -> WARN 016 Before using BCCSP, please call InitFactories(). Falling back to bootBCCSP. 2017-05-17 04:22:15.963 EDT bccsp GetDefault -> WARN 017 Before using BCCSP, please call InitFactories(). Falling back to bootBCCSP. I think we should fix it by simply calling *factory.InitFactories(nil)* at the main.go of cryptogen. ~mastersingh24 >
